Raleigh.Grace Christian School (North Carolina): GRACE Christian School is a private, Christian, coeducational, primary and secondary day school in Raleigh, North Carolina, United States. Also known as GRACE Christian or simply GRACE, the school seeks to educate students in a traditional Christian environment. Each letter in GRACE is capitalized as it is an acronym which stands for Greater Raleigh Area Christian Education, the official name of the parent non-profit organization.
